field.name: fDefaultAmount
field.desc: Defaut amount of max marksman skill.

field.name: fMinUseAmount
field.desc: Minimum amount of marksman skill needed to enter the mode.

field.name: fInitialUseAmount
field.desc: Initial amount of marksman skill used up when activating the mode.

field.name: fUseRatePerSecond
field.desc: Amount of marksman skill meter that gets used per second.

field.name: fRechargeRatePerSecond
field.desc: Amount of marksman skill meter that gets restored per second.

field.name: fRechargeAmountPerKill
field.desc: Amount of marksman skill meter that gets restored per kill.

field.name: fRechargeAmountPerHeadShot
field.desc: Amount of marksman skill meter that gets restored per kill.

field.name: fRechargeAmountPerStealthKill
field.desc: Amount of marksman skill meter that gets restored per kill.

field.name: fRechargeAmountMultiKillMultiplier
field.desc: Amount of marksman skill meter that gets restored per kill.

field.name: fMaxTargetDistance
field.desc: Furthers distance to consider targets.

field.name: fCameraMoveRate
field.desc: Rate camera moves to target in degrees per second.

field.name: fCameraStartMoveRate
field.desc: Initial rate camera moves to target in degrees per second.

field.name: fCameraBlendDuration
field.desc: Time it takes for camera movement to reach the maximum speed.

field.name: fWeaponMoveRate
field.desc: Rate weapon moves to target in degrees per second.

field.name: PostFX
field.desc: The name of the post FX to play.

field.name: fTargetSelectInnerScreenRatio
field.desc: Enemies that fall inside this area of the screen are ignored.

field.name: fTargetSelectOuterScreenRatio
field.desc: Enemies that fall outside this area of the screen are ignored.

field.name: bUseSlowMo
field.desc: Modifiers for reflex fire.

field.name: fCameraPitchAmount
field.desc: How much the camera pitches when travelling at the maximum turn speed for pitching.

field.name: fCameraMoveMaxTurnSpeedForPitch
field.desc: The maximum turn (yaw) speed for the weapon in order to have the maximum pitch offset.

field.name: fCameraMoveDistanceScaler
field.desc: When at the near angle distance the cmaera move rate will be multiplied by this value.

field.name: fCameraMoveNearAngles
field.desc: The nearest distance between the current aim and the target at which the camera move rate will be multiplied by the distance scaler

field.name: fCameraMoveFarAngles
field.desc: The furthest distance between the current aim and the target at which the camera will not be multiplied by the distance scaler.
